title: The Reluctant Husband
description: She was still his wife!Frankie thought she'd seen the last of her husband, Santino Vitale - until he breezed back on the scene with some earth shattering news. Their marriage wasn't annulled, and he intended to claim the wedding night they'd never had!He had it all worked out. Within three weeks Frankie would have paid her dues and be free to leave Sardinia and file for divorce.But Santino hadn't reckoned on falling for Frankie all over again - or that now she could be expecting his baby.
author: Lynne Graham
